repositories.author: flyimg
repositories.name: flyimg
repositories.description: Dockerized PHP7 application runs as a Microservice to resize and crop images on the fly. Get optimised images with MozJPEG, WebP or PNG using ImageMagick. Includes face detection, cropping, face blurring, image rotation and many other options. Abstract storage based on FlySystem in order to store images on any provider (local, AWS S3...).
